title: How do eye tracking devices work? What is the principle? - Quora

response.answer_text: It uses Image Processing software, along with either Fuzzy logic or Neural networks. The image processing software is responsible for extraction of features. This is then passed to the next stage. The next stage consists of image pattern recognition software. This is based on Fuzzy or Neural networks. Both of them behave similar to how a human brain works. They can work even if complete information is not available. This part of the system needs extensive training, in which it will be shown different eye images, so that it can connect to form a network which can, with sufficient accuracy detect eyes.
